ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: I totally disagree Shada, bards are very useful, imo on large raids, the resistances they provide alone are amazing...
ygData.messageBody:
I totally disagree Shada, bards are very useful, imo on large raids, the
resistances they provide alone are amazing...

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
> [mailto:garramone@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 23, 2001 6:24 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
>
>
> Well Dark you wouldn't being experiencing anything if you
> weren't on the
> raid. And if you weren't on the raid, the raid wouldn't be noticing
> anything different either. You need, "need" not want, 1 bard
> on a raid.
> Any more bards would be better replaced by another class.
>
> Shada/Erisi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Blitz Krieg [mailto:blitz_krieg@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 23, 2001 5:05 PM
> To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
>
>
> I'm in total agreement. I can't speak for solo play, but in
> group play
> we simply kick ass. Even on raids, with the right guild that
> knows how
> to use us, we're no slouches. Thott throws out a lot of numbers about
> how we don't scale well as we level, but somehow his analysis doesn't
> mirror my experiences on a daily basis.
>
> Hopefully VI is just looking at "stacking issues" and not
> anything more
> grand. :)
>
> Darkfox
> Xegony
>
